      • isValid

        boolean isValid(org.bukkit.Location l,
              org.bukkit.Chunk[] affected_chunks)
        Validate a location.
        Parameters:
        l - Location where player will be teleported
        affected_chunks - Array of chunks which should be checked
        Returns:
        True if is valid; False if not
